alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 09 at 10:51AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following areas, Adams, Columbia, Cumberland, Dauphin, Franklin, Juniata, Lancaster, Lebanon, Montour, Northern Lycoming, Northumberland, Perry, Schuylkill, Snyder, Southern Lycoming, Sullivan, Tioga, Union and York. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall continues to fall over parts of the region, especially south of Williamsport and north of Harrisburg. Point amounts of 2-3 inches of rain are already starting to create localized flooding problems. Additional heavy rain is expected to develop over southern PA and continue over the area currently receiving heavy rain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
